| Kubfu is a fighting Pok√©mob.
| Kubfu evolves into :doc:`urshifu_single`:
|  -  When given a Parchment of Darkness.
| 
| Kubfu evolves into :doc:`urshifu_single`:
|  -  When given a Parchment of Water.
